definition: A small piece of paper, fabric, or plastic attached to an object, typically used to provide information about the object, such as its contents, instructions, or identification. It is commonly found on various consumer products, clothing items, and food packaging.

examples.german: Das Etikett auf der Flasche ist abgefallen.
examples.english: The label on the bottle has fallen off.

examples.german: Bitte entfernen Sie das Etikett vor dem Waschen.
examples.english: Please remove the label before washing.

examples.german: Das Etikett ist auf der Rückseite des Produkts angebracht.
examples.english: The label is attached to the back of the product.
